title: Add business address to Contact Us section and footer

requirements.summary: Update ContactSection.tsx address card to display the real business address
acceptanceCriteria: The address card in the Contact Us section displays 'Saharanpur Rd, Gangoh Khalsa, Uttar Pradesh 247341'
No placeholder address text remains in ContactSection.tsx

file_operations.description: Replace the placeholder address text in the address card with the real business address 'Saharanpur Rd, Gangoh Khalsa, Uttar Pradesh 247341'. Locate the address card (identified by MapPin icon) and update its text content while preserving the card structure, icon, and styling. Do not modify phone number '9719774964' or email 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com'.

requirements.summary: Update Footer.tsx to display the real business address in contact info section
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays 'Saharanpur Rd, Gangoh Khalsa, Uttar Pradesh 247341' in the contact info section
No placeholder address text remains in Footer.tsx

file_operations.description: Replace the placeholder address text in the Footer's contact info section with the real business address 'Saharanpur Rd, Gangoh Khalsa, Uttar Pradesh 247341'. Locate the address display in the contact information area and update its content while maintaining the existing layout, styling, and structure. Do not modify phone number '9719774964' or email 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com'.
